derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin cinnabaris, from Greek kinnabari, of oriental origin

means.word_mean: 1. a heavy reddish mineral consisting of mercuric sulfide; the chief source of mercury
2. large red-and-black European moth; larvae feed on leaves of ragwort; introduced into United States to control ragwort
1. of a vivid red to reddish-orange color
